definition: to insert/stick in/pierce/to take part in/to interfere/to interpose
seat/base/stand/CL:個|个[ge4]/classifier for buildings, mountains and similar immovable objects

sentences.english: You can't use the strategy for Jacks or Better when playing Deuces Wild.
sentences.chinese: 您不能使用插座或更好，當播放百搭2的戰略。

sentences.english: The wire snapped at the wall plug and the light fused.
sentences.chinese: 牆上插座的電線短路燒斷了保險絲，電燈跟着滅了。

sentences.english: The container has to be covered with a clean cloth, making the receptacle dustproof sealed.
sentences.chinese: 容器用清潔織布覆蓋，插座防塵密封。

sentences.english: Use a separate individual electrical socket to plug in your oven plug.
sentences.chinese: 採用獨立電源，不可與其他電器共用插座。

sentences.english: There is a power point for shaver in the bathroom.
sentences.chinese: 浴室裏有供電動剃鬚刀用的電源插座。

sentences.english: I was he witched by an electrical outlet that screamed out to me to stick in my little finger.
sentences.chinese: 我被一個電插座迷住了，它朝我直叫，讓我很惱火。

sentences.english: If mass-terminated cables are used, mating receptacles can be mounted at the test fixture.
sentences.chinese: 如果採用接線頭電纜，在夾具上則可以安裝匹配插座。

sentences.english: We knocked on the walls and spoke to our neighbors through the electrical sockets.
sentences.chinese: 我們在牆上敲打，透過插座和隔壁牢房的人說話。

sentences.english: The switch socket of the utility model has the advantages of multiple types and replaceable performance.
sentences.chinese: 該開關插座具有可更換，種類多的特點。

sentences.english: No ballasts, cooling fans or effectors needed. LED lights use standard light bulb sockets.
sentences.chinese: 不需要驅動器或冷卻風扇標準的電源插座接頭。

sentences.english: Power sockets for benches will be shown in the relative plan view.
sentences.chinese: 工作臺上的電源插座在相關側面圖上標示。

sentences.english: Rear phono socket inputs for Phono.
sentences.chinese: 後方唱機插座輸入唱機。

sentences.english: They used electricity from a plug in the garage.
sentences.chinese: 他們議決車庫插座取電。

sentences.english: The fire has been blamed on a space heater or an overloaded power strip.
sentences.chinese: 這場火災是由於取暖器或者是電源插座過載所致。

sentences.english: Can also be used for cassette recording in stereo, in addition to line-out sockets.
sentences.chinese: 也可用於錄音機記錄在立體聲中，除了線路輸出插座。

sentences.english: I screwed the bulb into the socket.
sentences.chinese: 安裝燈泡和插座於燈外殼上。

definition: to leak electricity/(fig.) (coll.) to unintentionally arouse romantic interest (by being solicitous etc)/cf. 放電|放电[fang4 dian4]
electric light socket/burner (component of a kerosene lamp)/light (as a countable item, e.g. number of lights fitted in a house)
